properties.areaDesc: Union, KY; Gallatin, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:37AM CST until January 21 at 8:34AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown

.Heavy rainfall along the Ohio and Wabash Rivers has resulted in
Shawneetown reaching flood stage while J.T. Myers Dam will reach
flood stage Thursday. Both locations are forecast to crest on Friday
and then fall below flood stage by early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Shawneetown.
* until Tuesday January 21.
* At  8:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 33.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 36.3 feet by
Friday night. The river will fall below flood stage early
Tuesday morning.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
